data.name: InvalidUri
data.value: The Uri must be for an XHTML DTD, entity or module, using w3.org's base URI.

data.name: UnsupportedEntity
data.value:
The {0} only supports resolution for well-known XHTML DTDs and supporting resources. For security reasons, resolution of all other resources is prohibited; see the following for more information as why this decision was taken.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.xml.xmlreadersettings?view=net-5.0#security-considerations
The most likely reason to see this error is because there is an error in your XML, whereby it uses an unsupported entity. The second most likely is that you are trying to read an XLM document which uses a DTD other than XHTML. In this case you must write & provide your own implementation of {1} via the {2}.
